item.description:
This event follows our 6:30 p.m. dinner near the Boston-Allston line, though you do NOT have to attend the dinner or both - feel free come join us at 8:30 for singing, dancing and drinking !! Learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community. we will be there at 8:30pm to 11:30pm ( you also can stay later till they close.)
***********************
This group's 6:30 p.m. Friday Night Dinner shall be at Victoria's Seafood, 1029 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, just a few blocks from the Boston/Allston/Brighton city lines.

To make Karaoke convenient, a group member J. Spring Liu has kindly found for us a karaoke lounge located within walking distance of the restaurant:

DO RE MI KARAOKE From Victoria's Seafood Restaurant near the Boston/Allston/Brighton lines, there is [b]"Do Re Mi" Karaoke", about a 15 minute walk - here is the link to this facility and their rates: http://www.doremikara...

In the past, group members have customarily paid a per person cover charge of $10.00 at the Golden Leaf in Boston's Chinatown (Hudson Street).

Please note that the rates for Do Re Mi are a bit different - as a group staying for anywhere from 2 to 3 hours, it is possible that the cost would run higher, though you can view the website to see that Do Re Mi is not that different from the Golden Leaf in Chinatown/Boston.
item.how_to_find_us: Front Desk - ask for our group by name.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: FRIDAY NIGHT KARAOKE
